title: Braising and stewing
creator_contributor_role: KQED-TV (Television station : San Francisco, Calif.), production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Cookery
description: Episode of Series "Cooking at the Academy". Fill your kitchen with the tantalizing aromas of "Chicken Portugese", Phillipine-style "Pork Adobo" or a hearty "Sauerbraten". The time-honoured methods of braising and stewing turn inexpensive cuts into exotic main dishes. Among other savoury tips is included how to truss a rump roast, master a flavourful marinade and make a traditional German sauce spiced with gingersnaps.
related_objects: Series; S01150; Cooking at the Academy; Active; 1991
